website_summaries.verdict: A duo of classic glass mixing bowls by a popular name in glassware. They are affordable, but there is a possibility that some defective bowls make it through quality control.
pros: Basic glass bowls that hold up to 4 quarts, which makes them perfect for mixing ingredients
Glass has a hefty feel and is oven-safe
You get 2 bowls for a decent price
cons: A few bowls had defects in the glass, including small internal cracks
Occasionally bowls aren't perfectly round, which makes them difficult to stack

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and great size!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size at the perfect price. I also want to highlight the way they were packaged. My package was almost stolen by some weirdo, but luckily my neighbor happened to be outside and saw them and yelled out. The thief drop the package and ran. When my neighbor told me what happened I was sure I’d find them cracked and broken, but I couldn’t find a single scratch!
customer_reviews.author: MBelongings

customer_reviews.title: Always A Clean and Non-Toxic Water Bowl for My Dogs
customer_reviews.text: These thick and heavy glass bowls are super sturdy and will stand up to a lot of use. I ordered these as dog water bowls because I didn't want to expose my dogs to contaminants in plastic or metal water bowls. Since this package contained 2 bowls, I am able to keep a full water container available to my dogs at all times while the other bowl is in the dishwasher. I was surprised that the bowls I received are taller and narrower that I thought from the photo. I didn't like that part, but they are stable and seem to work well anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Linda HendrexTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Old Anchor Hocking.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get a good deal on these bowls. I noticed something shiny in the food that was in the bowl and it was a glass shard. This has happened a few times with 3 of the bowls and I've only had them a few weeks. They are not durable at all and I am not rough with them by any means. Please be careful with the rim chipping and shards going into your food. I will not buy again. Not the good old Anchor Hocking that it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, finally!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted non-plastic mixing bowls and didn’t realize how expensive or challenging it would be. Everything is either insanely overpriced or has plastic in some form on them. I was hoping these wouldn’t break in shipping and were what I was looking for. Thankfully they made it in one piece and they’re exactly what I wanted! These are great quality glass mixing bowls!
customer_reviews.author: A&MW11

customer_reviews.title: Bought set of two and only recieved one
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowl, but I was supposed to get set of two and only recieved one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bowls that needs better lids
customer_reviews.text: The glass bowl portion itself is very sturdy and nice, however, the lid is not so great. The lid is kind of hard to get on and off and even though it is considered "sealed" it has a strange looseness about it. I wish they would make this lid airtight. I could smell my husband's stinky kimchi every time he opened the refrigerator because it was stored in this bowl. I had to actually find another big bowl and double bowl it just to keep the smell inside. HAA! STRANGE BUT TRUE. I would recommend using these bowls to just store unscented or food with no offensive odors
customer_reviews.author: E.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bowl I own!
customer_reviews.text: I make all of our breads and this is my favorite mixing bowl. It is deep enough to not slop over the edge and large enough for a 2-loaf batch. It is heavy enough to be durable and it is also not plastic - the main reason I bought it. Great size, great shape, Glass! I highly recommend this to any who are as sick of plastic (petroleum sludge!) as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Malone

customer_reviews.title: Heavy quality bowls.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bowls. They are a heavier quality than other glass mixing bowls I have. I bought them to bake "The Easiest No Knead Bread" recipe as was recommended by the author of the recipe. The set came with six bowls and. I have given four of the bowls along with the recipe to friends already.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Was supposed to be a set of 2.  Only 1 in box!
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive as a set of 2 as promised. Only 1 bowl was in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Rakowski

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn't come off easily!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size bowl, very high quality etc. But, I cannot get the top off without sticking something under the lid and plying upwards! I bought two so I'm pretty sure I didn't get a fluke as I have the same problem with both. A shame, because they were good price and the size/shape I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TrishV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, but lids split
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I've only used these for 4 months and at least 2 of the 4 lids have started splitting already. I followed the instructions for top rack in the dishwasher only. Really disappointed. :( These are perfect for thawing raw food for my cats in the fridge! They hold 4-5 Stella and Chewy's cat medallions, 3 Primal bricks, or 2 Vital Essentials mini patties.
customer_reviews.author: Siliofor

customer_reviews.title: Quality glass mixing bowls with great capacity’s a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Best mixing bowls ever at a great price point for 2! I always used ceramic bowls in the past and finally mine cracked and died so I went with the glass; I definitely did not want stainless steel or plastic. They are 4 quarts capacity so perfect for large batches of anything to mix; plenty of room; food never goes over the rim. Highly recommended. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Geleia

customer_reviews.title: One bowl was fine. The other was more oval than round
customer_reviews.text: It's a two bowl set. One bowl was fine. The other was more oval than round, and doesn't sit flat on the counter. Quality Control asleep on the job?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes good soup bowls
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an older version of this bowl which I must admit I like better since it is a little bit smaller but the new ones are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Farmdog

customer_reviews.title: Heavy thick glass.  Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like very good quality glass; heavy and thick, and very practical. Not as wide as the pyrex ones, which I think is an advantage. I wash it easily by hand, but you have to have a good grip on it because it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Wow! 2 for the money?!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls and nice and big and very sturdy, yet still fit in an upper cabinet. I love how easy they are to clean. Great for cooking with, or even serving. I didn’t read description very well and was shocked when two came. Cannot best that deal! Do yourself a favor and order these
customer_reviews.author: thomas murin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my Sunbeam mixing bowl of 55 years..just loved that bowl and these two will be an excellent replacement..
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: If you need a glass mixing bowl, this is it. Heavy, heavy glass. I forget all the uses, but read the Amazon description. The main thing is that these are very high quality products. Did I say thick, heavy glass? You may even get a workout while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Deep heavy glass bowls are awesome for making bread. Awesome price' easy to clean because of the straight walls. Bowls with gradual sloping walls don't fit in the dishwasher, these do. Yeah, buy some today. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Doolan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Job!
customer_reviews.text: The price was perfect and so are the bowls. These bowls have no lip so I tape 2 of them together to form a protective enclosure for dark covered pot in solar cooker. These are a winner! Thank You Anchor
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: Anchor Hocking Glass Mixing Bowls 4 Qt.
customer_reviews.text: I got these today and they are beautiful. Very heavy duty and sturdy. The bowl is very well weighted and I know I will get a lot of use from it. Great value - did not have a need for both of them, so gave one to my neighbor next door and she said that was perfect for her needs and she loved it too. Great value !
customer_reviews.author: TMAC TexasTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: large heavy bowls
customer_reviews.text: we use these as water bowls for our dog and they're great. they hold a ton of water, and don't get knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Janan Kline

customer_reviews.title: A bit too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than expected. No carry handles. Need gloves to remove from microwave oven.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E

customer_reviews.title: Heirloom quality, timeless utility.
customer_reviews.text: I still have a couple colored mixing bowls from a set that my mother used when I was a kid in the 1950s. But I needed a couple more 4qt for the days I bake bread. These are the ticket! Solid, heavyweight, and beautiful - as you’d expect good tools to be. And they look good “standing still” on the baker’s bench awaiting their next use. You won’t regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: bgross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: We have a large family and these are perfectly sized. Very sturdy. Great prep bowls. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Great and Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I needed some larger bowls and have been looking at the local stores only to find them for $30 + dollars. Decided to try and find the one I liked on Amazon and found this one and it comes in a two pack how convenient. They are great bowls and made in the USA which is a great bonus. They are a bit on the heavy side but I will more than likely be purchasing another set just to have.
customer_reviews.author: Sassie girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I like these bowls. They've got a good weight to them about and don't feel too thin. They've washed up well in the dishwasher and overall, I feel they're a good value
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mendes Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bread making
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy making artisan bread. I make 2 loaves at a time. These bowls are great for this. When mixing ingredients, I can see that the dough is thoroughly mixed.
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: Brown Specks in the Glass:  manufacturing problem?
customer_reviews.text: Brown Debris In the glass. Appears to be manufacturing problem
customer_reviews.author: G Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: First, I’d like to thank Amazon for always being the best online shop. This item was delivered quickly and it is perfect for its intended use. It’s the best for bread-yeast mixture and proofing. You can also use it for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: UsTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Bowls stuck together
customer_reviews.text: The two bowls came FIRMLY stuck one in the other. We tried Hot water in one, Ice in another bowl, but nothing tried to date will unstick the pair. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Gary Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit larger than I wanted but they do the trick. These are very sturdy, heavy mixing bowls that certainly won't chip easily. It's nice to have two in case I drop one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Good Glass Utility Bowl
customer_reviews.text: These are plain Jane glass bowls. I bought them to use as mixing and storage bowls. You can serve with them also but I chose to have a more decorative bowl. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T.Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl! Bad lid
customer_reviews.text: I would give it all 5 stars, but the lid isn’t air tight and things leak from it. I love using this as a salad bowl, but if I shake my vinegarette in the container with the lid on, the dressing gets everywhere. Other than it’s the perfect size and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about these bowls, but they are my go-to for everything. I have had a couple for years and just recently bought more. The rim makes them feel more stable and also easier to grab than other glass bowls. I use them to eat soup, prep foods, etc. etc. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baking Dish
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a specialty Italian dish called a timpano for a big party based on the film"Big Night" Perfect for baking anything large that needs to go in the oven
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ricco-Pena

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite mixing bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love the depth and smaller width -- perfect for mixing and salad. Great weight
customer_reviews.author: Boise Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great in oven!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for baking sourdough bread on tiles. Reliable and heavy enough to trap steam.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for healthy microwave popcorn!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is sturdy enough to stand the heat of homemade popcorn: 1 T. butter melted in microwave for 30 sec. Add 1/4 c. popcorn kernels (Trader Joe's has organic). Cover with microwave lid that has tiny holes (Tovolo Microwave Cover ). It takes 4-6 minutes depending on microwave. Best to have those microwave pot holders (Trudeu Stay Cool Silicone Pinch Holders) to remove bowl and dump into serving bowl. Absolutely delicious even without added salt. Healthy too!
customer_reviews.author: flower fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive for serving and great mixing bowl as well! Anchor Hocking products have always been the best.
customer_reviews.author: carol j

customer_reviews.title: Missing half the order
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowl but this is listed as a set of two. Only received one. Ummmm hello?
customer_reviews.author: Shauna R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen staple
customer_reviews.text: These are such a wonderful addition to my kitchen. So simple and useful! I use them to make the peasant bread in the oven and works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: perfect for popcorn
customer_reviews.text: the bowl perfectly fits a bag of popcorn. the shape of this bowl, coming mostly straight up, rather than having a very rounded profile, makes it take up less space on a small table or between two people on a couch.
customer_reviews.author: David McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. They will last a very long time (provided you do not drop them) for a variety of things. My primary use is for my oatmeal in the morning since I can microwave the bowl with it's contents. And they make great mixing bowls for your small baking items.
customer_reviews.author: DebGarden

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. Heavy Glass. I would totally recommend. Unfortunately I ordered in error. Too big for my microwave. Super quality tho.
customer_reviews.author: ZaVi25HonestMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: A great price for great products. My only difficulty is the weight. These bowls are HEAVY! Depending on how much you can lift, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and thick and clear glass. As described. Kept one have one to my daughter. It’s already a favorite go to when baking.
customer_reviews.author: LMEL

customer_reviews.title: Only one of a two set arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting there to be two mixing bowls because it was described and listed as a set of two bowls. Only one arrived. It is a simple glass mixing bowl, certainly not worth $17.98 for just one of them. I would like the other one of the set to be shipped to me or half of the price refunded to my account. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L Greth

customer_reviews.title: Great for Using With Electric Mixer
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are just what I wanted. I needed microwave safe bowls that were deep enough to use with my electric mixer if I need to. These work great!
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: Big bowls and I love how clear I can see that are very thick bowls very well made
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Chuckluck

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased!!! This says it’s a set of 2 and I only received 1. Way too pricy for just one. I’m pretty sure I’ll be returning if I can’t get ahold of customer service and get this rectified.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Only one bowl came with the set of two
customer_reviews.text: Title speaks for itself. It just wasnt in the package
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E. Pipkin

customer_reviews.title: and these are still in perfect condition. Great size for mixing up large volumes ...
customer_reviews.text: Several months of use, and these are still in perfect condition. Great size for mixing up large volumes of meat, giant salads, etc. Lids are tight, but that's a good thing. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V91-Bleach

customer_reviews.title: broken bowl
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are just what I wanted,however, one of them was broken. impossible to return as it is in many pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J

customer_reviews.title: Best Sturdy Glass Bowl Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooo pleased with this bowl! I was hesitant at first thinking it will not fit on my sunbeam cake mixer but it is better than the original bowl! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Xtremly satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls. Great for many things and not too fragile. I wish they came with lids. The first box did arrive with 2 bowls stuck together and one chipped but Amazon quickly exchanged, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: but they're great bowls.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were just a little bit smaller. They're a little heavy and large while cleaning, but they're great bowls.
customer_reviews.author: jayme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bowl
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a similar one. However, we only received a single bowl, not a set of 2. The bowl is very sturdy. Great size for a large salad or for mixing. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Streaky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and deep, I love them, but wish I had ordered the smaller one's, these are good for big job's and made good.
customer_reviews.author: Nyoka

customer_reviews.title: May be a second...
customer_reviews.text: Each one of these bowls had a "place" on the side like a defect. There is a tiny place on the side of each bowl that resembles a chip. Thusfar none have cracked but I do have other Anchor Hocking bowls and one in the set is the exact same size and none of them have this imperfection...
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get by without them.
customer_reviews.text: Hold up well, and last forever, unless you drop a stack of them on a hard counter top, as I did. This is why I ordered this replacement set, and have been using the same type of Anchor bowls for many years. I use them in the morning for preparing oatmeal, and in the evenings for quick single-bowl meals.
customer_reviews.author: Kilili

customer_reviews.title: Lids could be better but I’m happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: The only draw back is that the kids are hard to get on and sealed. I’m worried over time they may get brittle but that’s a worry. Otherwise I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Miller

customer_reviews.title: A set of 2 but only received 1 Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Only received one bowl, even though the description said a set of 2 bowls. Bowl is really well made but really dissatisfied and disappointed, that I only received just one bowl.
customer_reviews.author: V M M

customer_reviews.title: GreAt bowls
customer_reviews.text: Use this mobile for most everything. Especially making dips and serving vegetables
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L Gibb

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality of these bowls. Thicker than I anticipated and glad.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie99va

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Perfect for that bowl of soup or cereal.
customer_reviews.author: dj garner

customer_reviews.title: Nice size bowls
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bowls. Heavy but not too heavy to manage. Price is right. I would give them 5 stars if they were not factory seconds. The rim is not true. Perhaps that is why they were less expensive than comparable bowls. If you can deal with slight imperfections, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good value and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use it for big salads, a fruit and vege bowl and it's not so big it won't fit in the cabinet. Price is for a set of 2. A regular roll of plastic wrap will cover it. I love clear glass in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: VERY USEFUL IN KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Microwave safe. Dishwasher safe. Easy to clean. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for water bowls for my dog and cats. They are a great size and are easy to clean. Not sure why I didn’t think of this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Realy a good deal and they are great for many things around ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised, packaging was well packaged, and they are just what I wanted for using my hot air popper, my other bowl was too shallow and the popcorn was sent in many directions until enough managed to stay in the bowl. Realy a good deal and they are great for many things around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: These are great sized mixing bowls for your hand mixer. My original glass mixing bowl that I had for probably over 15 years, shattered in my cabinet above my oven. I ordered these as a replacement and I am very pleased. It's nice to have TWO for this price and they are heavy duty bowls.
customer_reviews.author: dluvsamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped with care and the bowls are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Covers
customer_reviews.text: Within three weeks they tops were cracked and wouldn’t seal. I’ve thrown these away.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gwin

customer_reviews.title: Was cracked
customer_reviews.text: The inside bowl had a few very small cracks and some very obvious scratching on the outside of the bowl, even though it was very well packed and insulated. Returning- too bad because they looked like nice bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bowls, great for soups and salads
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are very large and sturdy. They're perfect for salads, pasta, soups, and more. I use them for food preparation and for serving. They last for years. I've had one of these bowls for more than 15 years and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Anchor Hocking Glass Food Prep and Mixing Bowls, 4 Quart (Set of 2), Clear - 81629L11
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I needed and exactly as described. Well packaged and delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Plumbtree

customer_reviews.title: arrived well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Have used them a few times and they work really well
customer_reviews.author: Macena Maginity

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It arrived on time and it was exactly what I ordered. The packaging was great and nothing was broken nor scratched. The quality of the glass was great. I will be ordering more for friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Quality vs price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The glass is nice and thick. These are also big and really great for needing to double a recipe. The set of two for the price I got I thought they might not be the quality I was looking for, but no worries here! They are very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: sharon Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these bowls! I use them for bread doughs and mixing ingredients, but these are pretty and large enough for serving. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love the glass bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowls, however the smallest bowl's lid doesn't fit the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mixing and dough proofing bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for - a large bowl that's easy to clean. It's perfect for letting dough rise in and the dough doesn't stick as much as a stainless steel bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase of the two 4 quart bowls .
customer_reviews.author: jessica j

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, stable mixing bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, stable mixing bowl. Unfortunately, they are slightly out of round, which I can't help but notice every time I look at them. This also causes them not to stack very well. It's a small complaint really, but it seems like a mass-produced glass bowl should be uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Dane T Randel

customer_reviews.title: Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller size bowl than the 2.5 qt pyrexes and these are perfect for storing dips, whipped cream, or leftovers. Fit in the ice box better too.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1 not 2!
customer_reviews.text: I love Anchor Hocking and I love this bowl but I only received one not two, so I'm obviously very unhappy. I have tried to complain and tried to get this fixed to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: T J F

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, it will likely be damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 2 stars because one of the mixing bowls came with a crack in it already and I do not want to return the other. This was a mother's day gift, so it really was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: osob samantar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking and non toxic.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bowls but the smallest one, the cover does not fit...I recieved two sets and neither one fit. But, they are beautiful bowls, and non toxic.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality Products by Anchor Hocking.
customer_reviews.text: This bowl was delivered on time and in perfect condition. It’s huge and durable. I can’t wait to use it. Anchor Hocking makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: These bowls with lids are unbeatable!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a bowl like these, but when I stored food in the refrigerator, I'd have to find a way to cover it. Getting bowls with a cover has made these so much easier to use for storing in the fridge
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Lids won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Lids are hard to put on and once on pop off in refrigerator so food is not sealed well. Waste of Money, I hope the seller reaches out because now I can not reach out to Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: 5/6 look nice, one chipped
customer_reviews.text: One of the bowls was badly chipped along the rim when it arrived, sharp and unusable. The other 5 were fine and look really nice. Shipping box wasn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ammy Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Best product I’ve bought online in awhile. Very durable, great price. You can’t go wrong if you are in the market with these!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls With Bad Packaging. Arrived Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: While I love these bowls, they were not sufficiently packaged for the trip. The bowls I got arrived stacked on top of each other with only a whisper of cardboard between them. During their travels, they rubbed and bounced up and down on each other (hubba hubba), causing them to crack and scratch. The set I got was damaged, so I ended up ordering a single bowl from another seller. These bowls are kitchen workhorses, and very handy. Just wish the packaging was different so they set had arrived safely.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L.

customer_reviews.title: love these bowls!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought these. I needed more than one and I was so happy to find two 4 qt bowls! They work very well and I like their look.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 bowl in order!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but there was only one in the box. The description says you get 2 bowls. ???
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great for Homemade Bread Making
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of baking at home. Up until now I had one of these bowls, but that just wasn't enough. Sometimes I have 3 or more doughs on the rise at a time. I love the durability of the glass and the wide open brim that allows me to knead right in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Yiannakis

customer_reviews.title: Bowls are good, but not the lids.
customer_reviews.text: The lids cracked and don't seem to fit right on the bowls anymore, but otherwise the bowls are good.
customer_reviews.author: Genna

customer_reviews.title: No issues, meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand. I use a lot of their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: 65 Double Cab

product_meta.title: Anchor Hocking 4-Quart Glass Mixing Bowl, Set of 2, Clear, Model Number:
product_meta.description: Size:4 Quart (Set of 2)| Style Name:No LidsAnchor Hocking mixing bowls are made with easy mixing in mind. The oversized 4-quart bowls are perfect for whipping up cookies or brownies. The glass is oven-safe and made in the USA. Great for mixing, serving and storing, these bowl are a kitchen essential for any baker. Anchor Hocking manufactures and markets a vast array of quality products for the home. Anchor Hocking is best known for their high quality glass tabletop and bakeware products manufactured in the USA since 1905.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: This Anchor Hocking set of mixing bowls contains (2) 4-quart mixing bowls. Beautify how you prep, serve how you mix.
DURABLE: This set of mixing bowls was designed for any lunch or dinner. Prep it and serve it. No need to dirty two dishes. Less work means more enjoyment.

SAFE: Anchor Hocking glass is healthier than plastic and metal. It will not warp, stain, retain smells, or leach dangerous chemicals into food or drinks.Use your Anchor Hocking Glass in gas and electric ovens up to 425 degrees Fahrenheit without browning element, although you should avoid sudden temperature changes
FIVE-YEAR : Backed by a protective limited five-year , these glass mixing bowls promise to impress for many years to come.
